events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back after receiving the wrong item.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello, this is Emma from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and want to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 548912 and I have attached a clear photo showing that the item is not what I originally ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and you can keep the incorrect item if you prefer.
That sounds great, thank you for resolving this so quickly. I appreciate being able to keep the wrong item.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the funds to appear in your account.
We just wanted to follow up and confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey about your recent support experience. Your feedback helps us improve.
